item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description: This page provides an example of using R Markdown. Code block x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 1.76 ## 2 2 0.07 ## 3 3 3.70 ## 4 4 4.68 ## 5 5 4.57 ## 6 6 6.33 ## 7 7 5.61 ## 8 8 6.43 ## 9 9 10.00 ## 10 10 8.42
